mapper.update: create table news ( id bigint, title varchar(255), sub_title varchar(255), create_time date, last_edit_time date, content varchar(8192), news_tag_id bigint, hot boolean default false, img_list varchar(8192), notes varchar(4096), valid boolean default true, primary key (id) ) default charset = utf8

update news set title = #{data.title}, sub_title = #{data.sub_title}, last_edit_time = #{data.last_edit_time}, content = #{data.content}, news_tag_id = #{data.news_tag_id}, hot = #{data.hot}, img_list = #{data.img_list}, notes = #{data.notes} where id = #{data.id}
mapper.select: select id, title, sub_title, create_time, last_edit_time, content, news_tag_id, hot, img_list, notes from news where valid = true and id = #{id}
select id, title, sub_title, create_time, last_edit_time, content, news_tag_id, hot, img_list, notes from news where valid = true and hot = true order by last_edit_time desc limit 20
select id, title, sub_title, create_time, last_edit_time, content, news_tag_id, hot, img_list, notes from news where valid = true order by last_edit_time desc limit 12
